(football team)|Galatasaray SK]]. ==History== They have been members of the Turkish Youth league formed in 1988 and Turkish PAF League formed in 1999. They play their home games at [[Metin Oktay]] Facilities in [[Florya]], which is also the training ground of Galatasaray S.K. The team mainly consists of Under-21 players at the club, although senior players occasionally play in the reserve side, under special conditions. The reserves head coach is Erkan ÃltanÄ±r, who picks and manages the side. Galatasaray PAF won the Turkish PAF league titles in last three years. ==Current squad== {{updated|September 2011}}{{citeweb|url=http://www.galatasaray.org/altyapi/takim.php|title=GALATASARAY A2 KADROSU| date = September 2011|work=Galatasaray.org| accessdate = September 2011}} ==Coaching staff== {{citeweb|url=http://www.galatasaray.org/altyapi/pages/altyapi_kadro.php|title=Futbol Akademisi Ä°dari ve Teknik Kadro| date = 7 September 2010|work=Galatasaray.org| accessdate = 7 September 2010}} {| class="wikitable" |- !
